#summary Pseudo-elements are CSS selectors that match elements based on information outside the DOM.
#labels about-css
[http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-selectors/#pseudo-elements CSS3] specify that pseudo-elements should be made of two colons (::), to make clear distinction between pseudo-elements and pseudo-classes.
